## Overview

In this lesson, the basic principles and concepts of thematic mapping and geovisualisation will be introduced. You will also gain hands-on experience on using [**tmap**](https://r-tmap.github.io/tmap/) package to build cartographic quality thematic maps.

## Content

-   Geospatial Visualisation
    -   Classification of maps
    -   Principles of map design
    -   Thematic mapping techniques
    -   Analytical mapping techniques
